message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it is worth $800,000. We would be delighted to offer you this opportunity to own such a valuable asset at this exclusive price.
Hello Alice, thank you for presenting your product. While it seems like a quality item, I'm working with a tighter budget. Would you consider a price of $700,000?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration of your offer, we've decided to counter with a proposal of $750,000. We believe this reflects a fair compromise while still ensuring that we receive a reasonable return for our valuable asset.
Alice, I appreciate the adjustment.  To be frank, $720,000 is the highest I can go. If that's agreeable, I'm ready to close the deal.
